Description: A small fragment of undyed cotton shroud with an open plain weave and a warp thread count of 7 and weft thread count of 3. Warp and weft are 's'-spun.
Bibliographic references: Adams et al 1999 / Kulubnarti III: The Cemeteries (p. 57)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Donated by: W S Webb Museum of Anthropology (University of Kentucky)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: 93.2.2B (excavation object cat. no.)
